ingredients.content: 3 ½ oz yellow onions, quartered (approx. ½ onion)
½ oz cilantro, leaves and tender stems (approx. ½ bunch)
1 jalapeño pepper, stems and seeds removed
30 oz canned black beans, (approx. 2 cans) rinsed and strained

preparations.content: Place onions, cilantro, garlic and jalapeño into mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 6<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add beans, lime juice, oil, salt, cumin and black pepper and purée <b>20 sec/speed 6<b>. Serve immediately or store in an airtight container in the refrigerator.
